job.title: Network System Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>We are hiring a System Network Engineer for a MSP Company to start immediately. This is an on site, contract to hire position. (NO C2C or Sponsorship)</strong></p><p><br></p><p>You will be providing both remote and on site support in regards to any System and Network issues for the customers.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><strong>We are looking for someone who is: (Required experiences)&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>Experienced in setting up and provisioning VMWare 6 &amp; 7&nbsp;</li><li>Supporting Layer 3 switches&nbsp;</li><li>Bachelor Degree or related certificates such as CCNA, MCSE, etc.&nbsp;</li><li>Solid network and MS skills including cloud, understanding of cyber security, SonicWALL or solid firewall experience</li><li>Ability to support large scale WIFI&nbsp;</li><li>Project Management experience&nbsp;</li><li>A Valid Drivers' license as you need to drive to clients' sites when needed&nbsp;</li><li>Excellent interpersonal communication skills&nbsp;</li><li>A criminal background check will be conducted&nbsp;</li></ul>
